extendedInfo.description: ClassDojo helps teachers improve behavior in their classrooms quickly and easily. It also captures and generates data on behavior that teachers can share with parents and administrators.Teachers can use this app to give students realtime feedback while in class - it will sync with the main ClassDojo website.Better learning habits, smoother lessons, and hassle-free data - and it's free for teachers! Enhance your class with some dojo!NEW: Parents can now view their child's progress via the ClassDojo app! Just ask your child's teacher for an email invite or a parent code :)

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: The best app ever! My son\'s teacher can monitor how his behavior is during school and I can see it at any time. I feel like I have eyes in the classroom all the time, my son knows that; making his behavior better. It\'s great.
reviews.author: Tiffany Clingerman

reviews.title: Great App!!
reviews.comment: My students love creating their own avatars!! I love having a program that helps me with classroom management in a way they enjoy!
reviews.author: Jericka Nava Rojo

reviews.title: Two years and still using it!
reviews.comment: Love using it with my 7th graders,  my only issue is now with the update on my android I can no longer see all of the students names (it cuts off the letters) so I have to guess which child or click individuals to see the last name when student have similar 1st names.
reviews.author: Jennifer Williams

reviews.title: Makes participation grading easy!
reviews.comment: It\'s easy to set up a class and only moments to track their progress/participation. I also like the ability to randomize selecting students to respond in class.
reviews.author: Melissa Truong

reviews.title: Love knowing what my kid is doing!
reviews.comment: So excited that I can check up on my child anytime during the day. Let\'s me know if i need to make a surprise trip to the school...
reviews.author: Shanqula Duncan

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I know how my child\'s day is going in real time. No more waiting until I get home.
reviews.author: Tracee Gonzalez

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: I\'m a parent and love being able to see what my son is getting up to in class. He says everyone had fun creating their avatars and seeing each others. What a fab way to get them to take responsibility for their behaviour - the modern equivalent of a reward chart :)
reviews.author: Kate Mumford

reviews.title: Five Stars all the way
reviews.comment: What a way to keep up with my child\'s behavior! Great App
reviews.author: Danielle Hinton

reviews.title: Great tool for positive reinforcement
reviews.comment: Please add student\'s access to the app.   I have high schoolers that love to check their points.  I\'d also like to give multiple points at one time instead of one at a time.   Overall a great app!
reviews.author: Barbara Honold

reviews.title: A Classroom Management tool for teachers.
reviews.comment: Cute characters, adjustable positive and negative behaviors. Easy setup! Can\'t wait to try it in all my classes this year.
reviews.author: Elisabeth Austin

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It\'s a great easy way to see the behavior of your child while in school
reviews.author: ruth jones

reviews.title: Great app for the classroom!
reviews.comment: Marvelous way to praise or rebuke pupils without interrupting the flow of the lesson.
reviews.author: Dawn Byers

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: I like it a lot but not sure hoe to take stuff off when accidentally putting something on the wrong student.
reviews.author: Rachel Vuocolo

reviews.title: My kid is in awe.
reviews.comment: I can monitor him during the day as long as teacher keeps it up to date.  Wish my son could change his avatar off app.
reviews.author: Rick Hartzell

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: This is such a great idea. It\'s si much easier to know exactly what kind of day my son had now that the school is using Class Dojo.
reviews.author: LaDonna Everett

reviews.title: Love it,thanks
reviews.comment: Which it had more feauture,but overall great app!!!
reviews.author: Jasany Aviles

reviews.comment: Love love love! Works so great with my 6th and 8th graders.
reviews.author: Danielle Garayalde

reviews.title: So many applications!
reviews.comment: This is the motivational tool that finally works! Thank you Class Dojo!
reviews.author: Jacque Williams

reviews.title: Plugged in:-)
reviews.comment: My wife and I are very much into technology .  And this app allows us to stay up to speed with my daughters classroom status daily from our devices,  Great Idea!!!!!!!
reviews.author: PETE SANTOS JR

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: My sons teacher started using this and I love being able to see how my child is doing throughout the day! He enjoys showing off his good behavior points!
reviews.author: Rhonda Collins
